item.title: Prepare your application for CS PhD.
item.description: Catalog Catalog Before You Read Let’s Start Introduction Before Application What do I mean by managing research? Why do you need papers? The Application Connection Reference Letter Research Experience Publications Choosing programs and professors CV Meeting Slides Personal History Statement SOP/PS/RP Writing a PS Paragraph 1 Paragraph 2-4 Last two paragraphs GPA Research Internship TOFEL/GRE Connecting Professors via Email After Application Contact Me Before You Read This will be a long article which will take you approximately about 15 minutes to read.
